name: The Reign of King Jante
description:
The Reign of King Jante A Game by Amalie Kae

A surreal, semi open-world RPG with 100% original assets.
The Reign of King Jante tells the story of a young hero who is rejected by society.

Sum-Up:

King Jante has spiralled his people into deep despair.

You - a young hero full of ambition and will to do good - find yourself trapped in this dark land, where no one welcomes you, and everyone would rather see you suffer. 

Your only way out is to build your strength and to face Jante himself.

Links:

For more information about the project, visit: https://www.amaliekae.com/jante

Everything is done by Amalie Kae.
Follow on Instagram: @AmalieKae for future Game Projects.

Known Issues (To be fixed):

* A Mac-build will be added very soon.

*Wonky skill tree.
(Sometimes, skills do not save properly. A fix is in the works!)

Thank you for playing! 

Please let me know what you think, in a comment below.
